trans-unit.source: Open the project file default.js and in the app.OnActivated method overload, replace the last call to the refreshTodoItems method with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Open the project file default.js and in the app.OnActivated method overload, replace the last call to the refreshTodoItems method with the following code:

trans-unit.source: If you are using an identity provider other than Facebook, change the value passed to the login method above to one of the following: microsoftaccount, twitter, google, or windowsazureactivedirectory.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an identity provider other than Facebook, change the value passed to the login method above to one of the following: microsoftaccount, twitter, google, or windowsazureactivedirectory.

trans-unit.source: If you registered your Windows Store app package information with Mobile Services, you should call the login method by supplying a value of true for the useSingleSignOn parameter.
trans-unit.target: If you registered your Windows Store app package information with Mobile Services, you should call the login method by supplying a value of true for the useSingleSignOn parameter.

trans-unit.source: If you do not do this, your users will still be presented with a login prompt every time that the login method is called.
trans-unit.target: If you do not do this, your users will still be presented with a login prompt every time that the login method is called.

trans-unit.source: In the Windows Store app project, open the default.html project file and add the following button element just before the element that defines the save button:
trans-unit.target: In the Windows Store app project, open the default.html project file and add the following button element just before the element that defines the save button:

trans-unit.source: Press the F5 key to run the app and sign into the app with your chosen identity provider.
trans-unit.target: Press the F5 key to run the app and sign into the app with your chosen identity provider.

trans-unit.source: When you are successfully logged-in, the app should run without errors, and you should be able to query Mobile Services and make updates to data.
trans-unit.target: When you are successfully logged-in, the app should run without errors, and you should be able to query Mobile Services and make updates to data.
